translations.translation: We were gracious to you another time
We have bestowed Our favour on you before this
We have again bestowed Our favour upon you.
It is the second time that We have bestowed upon you Our favor.
“And indeed We had bestowed upon you a favour one more time.”
And indeed We conferred a favor on you another time (before)."
And certainly We bestowed on you a favor at another time;
Already another time We favoured thee,
And indeed, another time, already We have shown thee favour,
Indeed, We showed Our favour to you before also,
And assuredly We conferred a benefit on thee anot her time.
Certainly, We have done you a favour another time,
And indeed We conferred a favour on thee another time (before).
And indeed We conferred a favour on you another time (before).
We had already shown you favor
We had favored you another time.
And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
[20:37] And certainly, We have done you a favour [already] another time,
(And indeed, another time) other than this time, (already We have shown thee favour) We have favoured you at another time, i.e. other than this time,

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: قلت: { مرة }: منصوب على الظرفية الزمانية، وأصله: فعلة، من المرور، اسم للمرور الواحد، ثم شاع في كل فرد واحد من أفراد أمثاله، ويقرب منها الكرة والرجعة
